feed.title: Obtainium Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.44
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix minor translation error (#2121) by @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2133
  • Better file naming on selective export by @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2134

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.43...v1.1.44

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.45
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update hu.json by @summoner001 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2137
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2138
  • Fix GitLab bug that broke all repos with hyphens in their names (#2125)
  • Provide "current" link in HTML source errors to help w/ troubleshooting
  • Allow users to override author name (#1792) by @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2139

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.44...v1.1.45

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.46
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Possible fix for RuStore "Show Source webpage in App view" error by @Psychosoc1al in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2163
  • update french translation by @foXaCe in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2154
  • Possible fix for apps webpages opened twice with "Show Source webpage in App view" by @Psychosoc1al in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2164
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2171
  • Make downloads faster (#580)
  • Better sort options for GitHub releases (#2144)
  • Enable arch-based auto-filter for intermediate HTML links (#2162)
  • GitLab bugfix (#2167)

New Contributors

  • @Psychosoc1al made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2163
  • @foXaCe made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2154

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.45...v1.1.46

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.47
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update hu.json by @summoner001 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2174
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2188
  • Add welcome dialog (#2084)
  • Correct wording for arch filtering in HTML intermediate links (#2182)
  • Update package installer to use update ownership API (#2078)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.46...v1.1.47

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.48
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update hu.json by @summoner001 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2189
  • Update zh-Hant-TW.json by @abc0922001 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2191
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2207
  • Fix "Forbidden" error for APKMirror (#1973)
  • Switch from title case to sentence case + minor wording change (#2195, #2197)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.47...v1.1.48
